abstract: Advanced Micro Devices said that it was closing a technology gap with its rival Intel, cutting about in half the time required to move to a new manufacturing process.
snippet: Advanced Micro Devices said that it was closing a technology gap with its rival Intel, cutting about in half the time required to move to a new manufacturing process.
lead_paragraph: Advanced Micro Devices said Tuesday that it was closing a technology gap with its rival Intel, cutting about in half the time required to move to a new manufacturing process.

headline.main: A.M.D. Cuts Time Needed to Shift Production Method
headline.print_headline: A.M.D. Cuts Time Needed To Shift Production Method
